text: Giorgi Gorozia (Russian:Георгий Горозия; born 26 March 1995) is a Russian footballer who plays for FC Locomotive Tbilisi as a Midfielder. ==Career== ===Club=== Gorozia started his career at Lokomotivi Tbilisi, where he had a loan spell at FC Torpedo Kutaisi before moving to Norwegian club Stabæk Fotball on a three-year contract in August 2014. Gorozia made his début for Stabæk in a 1-1 home draw against Viking on 19 October 2014 in the Tippeligaen. On 17 February 2017, Gorozia signed for Zira FK until the end of the 2016–17 season. On 25 July 2018, Gorozia signed for RoPS. ===International=== Gorozia has represented Georgia at under-17,under-19 ,under-21level. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Locomotive Tbilisi |2011–12 |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Pirveli Liga |19||5||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||20||5 |- |2012–13 |26||7||2||1||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||28||8 |- |2013–14 |9||6||0||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||9||6 |- !colspan="2"|Total !54!!18!!3!!1!!-!!-!!-!!-!!-!!-!!57!!19 |- |valign="center"|Torpedo Kutaisi (loan) |2013–14 |Umaglesi Liga |14||0||2||0||colspan="2"|-||2||0||colspan="2"|-||18||0 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Stabæk |2014 |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |4||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||5||0 |- |2015 |26||1||6||1||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||32||2 |- |2016 |23||3||4||1||colspan="2"|-||2||0||0||0||29||4 |- !colspan="2"|Total !53!!4!!11!!2!!-!!-!!2!!0!!0!!0!!66!!6 |- |valign="center"|Zira |2016–17 |Azerbaijan Premier League |5||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||5||0 |- |valign="center"|Locomotive Tbilisi |2017 |Erovnuli Liga |16||2||0||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||16||2 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !142!!24!!16!!3!!-!!-!!4!!0!!0!!0!!162!!27 |} ==References== https://sportall.ge/fekhburthi/fekhburthii/legionerebi/121041-giorgi-gorozia- finethis-umaghles-ligashi-gadavida.html sportall.ge/.
